--- alter_table_add_column.sql
alter table foo add column baz string(max) not null
--- AST
&parser.AlterTable{
  pos:  0,
  Name: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  12,
    end:  15,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  TableAlternation: &parser.AddColumn{
    pos:    16,
    Column: &parser.ColumnDef{
      end:  51,
      Name: &parser.Ident{
        pos:  27,
        end:  30,
        Name: "baz",
      },
      Type: &parser.SizedSchemaType{
        pos:  31,
        end:  42,
        Name: "STRING",
        Max:  true,
        Size: nil,
      },
      NotNull: true,
      Options: (*parser.ColumnDefOptions)(nil),
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ADD COLUMN baz STRING(MAX) NOT NULL
